name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a skilled Software Engineer II with 8 years of experience, I specialize in developing robust solutions leveraging **React**, **TypeScript**, **GraphQL**, and **C#/.NET**. My extensive technical expertise includes working with databases such as **DynamoDB** and **MySQL**, while proficiently utilizing cloud services like **AWS** and **GCP**. I have a solid foundation in web technologies including **CSS**, **HTML**, and **JavaScript**, and I excel in implementing **microfrontend architecture** to enhance application performance.

I am experienced in **CI/CD** and **DevOps** practices, ensuring streamlined development processes through **Infrastructure as Code** and **mono repo build systems**. My background in building enterprise-grade applications is complemented by a strong emphasis on collaboration and agile methodologies. Additionally, I have hands-on experience with **Apollo** for state management in GraphQL applications, showcasing my ability to craft high-quality, scalable software solutions.
